item.title: Sergey add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I was with book, as a woman is with child." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Pindar
item.description: "O my soul, do not aspire to immortal life, but exhaust the limits of the possible." -- Pindar

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Anna Akhmatova
item.description: "You will hear thunder and remember me, and think: she wanted storms..." -- Anna Akhmatova

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Osip Mandelstam
item.description: "Я счастлив жестокой обидою, И в жизни поxожей на сон, Я каждому тайно завидую И в каждого тайно влюблен." -- Osip Mandelstam

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Sergey add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "I exist as I am, that is enough." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "... it was written I should be loyal to the nightmare of my choice." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Sergey add a quote by André Aciman
item.description: "I stopped for a second. If you remember everything, I wanted to say, and if you are really like me, then before you leave tomorrow, or when you’re just ready to shut the door of the taxi and have already said goodbye to everyone else and there’s not a thing left to say in this life, then, just this once, turn to me, even in jest, or as an afterthought, which would have meant everything to me when we were together, and, as you did back then, look me in the face, hold my gaze, and call me by your name" -- André Aciman

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Bella Akhmadulina
item.description:
"Застенчевый герой
О, мой застенчивый герой, ты ловко избежал позора. Как долго я играла роль, не опираясь на партнера!
К проклятой помощи твоей я не прибегнула ни разу. Среди кулис, среди теней ты спасся, незаметный глазу.
Но в этом сраме и бреду я шла пред публикой жестокой - все на беду, все на виду, все в этой роли одинокой.
О, как ты гоготал, партер! Ты не прощал мне очевидность бесстыжую моих потерь, моей улыбки безобидность.
И жадно шли твои стада напиться из моей печали. Одна, одна - среди стыда стою с упавшими плечами.
Но опрометчивой толпе герой действительный не виден. Герой, как боязно тебе! Не бойся, я тебя не выдам.
Вся наша роль - моя лишь роль. Я проиграла в ней жестоко. Вся наша боль - моя лишь боль. Но сколько боли. Сколько. Сколько." -- Bella Akhmadulina

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Bella Akhmadulina
item.description: "кто знает - вечность или миг мне предстоит бродить по свету. за этот миг иль вечность эту равно благодарю я мир." -- Bella Akhmadulina

item.title: Sergey add a quote by D. H. Lawrence
item.description: "sufficient unto the moment is the appearance of reality." -- D. H. Lawrence

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Homer
item.description: "How prone to doubt, how cautious are the wise!" -- Homer

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Anne Bronte
item.description: "But he who dares not grasp the thorn Should never crave the rose." -- Anne Bronte

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Let everything happen to you Beauty and terror Just keep going No feeling is final" -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Do not assume that he who seeks to comfort you now, lives untroubled among the simple and quiet words that sometimes do you good. His life may also have much sadness and difficulty, that remains far beyond yours. Were it otherwise, he would never have been able to find these words." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "The work of the eyes is done. Go now and do the heart-work on the images imprisoned within you." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Sergey add a quote by Osip Mandelstam
item.description: "My turn shall also come: I sense the spreading of a wing." -- Osip Mandelstam
